Uses of Class
com.caffeineowl.googlemaps.automation.AutomationErrorException

  • Packages that use AutomationErrorException 
    Package Description
    com.caffeineowl.googlemaps.automation.pageobjects
    A more evolved approach: isolate the UI translation code in classes dealing with the main UI "pages" (with Web applications, they may be pages, even if the use of Ajax may blur the line of distinction between pages quite a lot).
    com.caffeineowl.googlemaps.automation.pageobjects.ctxes  
    com.caffeineowl.googlemaps.automation.simple
    Simple approach to automation to mitigate the effects of a product with evolving UI: separate the "presentation layer decoding" from the "automation layer".
